ê°€ì…í•˜ê³  ë‚˜ë©´, ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì€ í™”ë©´ì´ ëœ¨ëŠ”ë°, â€˜I want to install Disqus on my siteâ€™ë¥¼ ì„ íƒí•˜ê³  ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì—¬ disqus ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•œë‹¤.

2. _config.yml discus shortname ì…ë ¥

_config.ymlì˜ disqus ë¶€ë¶„ì— Disqus í™ˆí˜ì´ì§€ admin/settingsì—ì„œ í™•ì¸í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” Shortnameì„ ì…ë ¥í•œë‹¤.

# Enter your Disqus shortname (not your username) to enable commenting on posts
# You can find your shortname on the Settings page of your Disqus account
disqus: Shortname ì…ë ¥

ê³ ë§™ê²Œë„ Jekyll Nowì—ëŠ” ë‚˜ë¨¸ì§€ ì„¸íŒ…ì´ ë˜ì–´ìˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— 3, 4ë²ˆì€ ê±´ë„ˆë›°ì–´ë„ ëœë‹¤.

3. /_includes/discus.html ë§Œë“¤ê¸°

{% if site.disqus %}
<div class="comments">
  <div id="disqus_thread"></div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var disqus_shortname = "{{ site.disqus }}";

    (function() {
      var dsq = document.createElement("script");
      dsq.type = "text/javascript";
      dsq.async = true;
      dsq.src = "//" + disqus_shortname + ".disqus.com/embed.js";
      (
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0] ||
        document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]
      ).appendChild(dsq);
    })();
  </script>
  <noscript
    >Please enable JavaScript to view the
    <a href="http://disqus.com/?ref_noscript"
      >comments powered by Disqus.</a
    ></noscript
  >
</div>
{% endif %}
